Package MCO2

Class DriverModel

java.lang.Object
MCO2.DriverModel
public class DriverModel extends Object
This class is responsible for handling the methods that are used to modify the view attributes

      Adds a machine to the machine list
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the vending machine
      slotcount - the number of slots in a machine
      itemCount - the lowest limit for item stock
      VMtype - a string represengin the type of vending machine
